fact: The Amazon rainforest produces about 20% of the world's oxygen. 🌿
Octopuses have three hearts and blue blood. 🐙💙
Bananas are berries, but strawberries are not. 🍌🍓
Honey never spoils; archaeologists have found pots of honey in ancient Egyptian tombs that are over 3000 years old and still edible. 🍯
A day on Venus lasts longer than a year on Venus. 🌌
More people die from lightning strikes than from shark attacks. ⚡🦈
Dolphins can sleep with one eye open. 🐬👁️
Some species of bamboo can grow up to 91 cm in a single day. 🎋
The heart of a blue whale is so large that a child could swim through its arteries. 🐋💙
Clouds can weigh over a million pounds. ☁️
Penguins can jump up to two meters out of the water. 🐧
The first computer took up more than 167 square meters. 💻
Turtles can breathe through their bottoms. 🐢
The Sahara Desert used to be a green savanna. 🏜️🌿
Koalas sleep up to 22 hours a day. 🐨💤
Starfish have no brains. ⭐
The Moon is gradually drifting away from Earth at a rate of 3.8 cm per year. 🌕↔️🌍
Elephants are the only animals that can't jump. 🐘
There are more plastic flamingos than real ones in the world. 🦩
Komodo dragons have bacteria in their saliva that can kill prey. 🐉
Coral reefs glow in the dark due to bioluminescent organisms. 🌊✨
Mount Everest is growing approximately 4 mm every year. 🏔️
Unicorns are the national animal of Scotland. 🦄
Sound does not travel in space due to the lack of atmosphere. 🚀🔇
